Name: Enfield Public Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon 11am-6pm; Wed and Fri 10am-6pm; Thurs 10am-9pm and Sat 9am-1pm and Sun 2-5pm. Closed Tues and public holidays. General reference assistance and copying services available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Users must give name and reason for use of collection along with undertaking not to publish information gained.

About.Acquisition focus: The collection includes paper-based, unpublished material of particular interest to the City of Enfield Council area. It also includes published local histories of areas in South Australia and other published material of interest historically to the Enfield area.

About.References: News Notes, Archives and Manuscripts, passim.
